title: The Tortoise and the Hare
description: The Tortoise and the Hare is a retelling of the classic fable. Given his great speed, boastful Hare is certain he will beat humble Tortoise in a race. Hare does not realize, however, that slow and steady wins the race. Students will enjoy this simple tale told through repetitive text and delightful illustrations.
meta: brag, hare, passed, race, steady, tortoise
Cause and Effect : Identify cause and effect
Short Vowel Sounds : Discriminate short vowel /a/ sound
Quotation Marks : Recognize and use quotation marks

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
